[00:00.00]All To Myself - Dan + Shay
[00:05.26]Written by：Shay Mooney/Nicolle Galyon/Jordan Reynolds/Dan Smyers
[00:10.52]I'm jealous of the blue jeans that you're wearing
[00:13.45]
[00:15.60]And the way they're holding you so tight
[00:18.27]
[00:20.70]I'm jealous of the moon that keeps on staring
[00:23.52]
[00:25.72]So lock the door and turn out the night
[00:28.43]

[00:32.38]We don't need anyone else
[00:34.47]
[00:35.12]Let our bodies do the talking
[00:37.17]
[00:37.67]Let our shadows paint the wall
[00:39.81]I want you here in my arms
[00:42.26]We'll hide away in the dark
[00:45.02]Slip your hand in my back pocket
[00:47.69]Go and let your long hair fall
[00:50.03]I want you all to myself
[00:53.74]To myself
[00:55.00]

[00:58.86]

data.trans:
[ti:All to Myself]
[ar:Dan   Shay]
[al:All to Myself]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.26]//
[00:10.52]我嫉妒你穿的那条蓝色牛仔裤
[00:13.45]
[00:15.60]因为它们紧紧地贴着你的身体
[00:18.27]
[00:20.70]我嫉妒月亮肆无忌惮地盯着你
[00:23.52]
[00:25.72]所以锁上门 远离那夜色
[00:28.43]
[00:29.54]我想让你完全属于我
[00:32.38]我们不需要别人
[00:34.47]
[00:35.12]让我们的身体互相交流
[00:37.17]
[00:37.67]让我们的影子映在墙上
[00:39.81]我想让你躺在我怀中
[00:42.26]我们隐藏在黑暗里
[00:45.02]你的手滑进我的后兜
[00:47.69]让你的长发散落开来
[00:50.03]我想让你完全属于我
[00:53.74]属于我
[00:55.00]
[00:55.94]我嫉妒从你口中吟唱出的那首歌
[00:58.86]
[01:01.19]因为它们久久辗转于你的唇齿间
[01:03.74]
[01:06.19]我或许太过偏执自私 但我想
[01:08.98]
